projects.name: MealSimple
projects.description: 1st Place Winner at Engineers Without Borders UofT Moral Code Hackathon. Developed a website using the Google Maps API to locate food banks, a recipes API to filter recipes by ingredients, and the ChatGPT API to generate custom recipes based on user preferences.

projects.name: WelcoMate
projects.description: B2B Category Winner at UofT Web3 Student Group Davinci Competition. Built an all-in-one hotel PMS and CRM website with an AI-powered trip planner for personalized itineraries. Leveraged Python libraries for scraping Toronto attractions, a weather API, Hugging Face API, and Gemini API to generate customized plans.

projects.name: League of Legends Statistics Analyzer
projects.description: Created a website that analyzed 100k data entries from the Riot API and other sources. Trained a machine learning model with over 75% accuracy to predict team win rates based on team compositions and other metrics. Built using Selenium for data scraping, Scikit-Learn for model training, SQLite for data storage, and Next.js with React for the website.

projects.name: Toronto Asian Art Museum Explorer
projects.description: Developed an Android app to showcase museum artifacts with searching, filtering, and administration features. Included PDF report generation and a user-friendly interface. Built using Java and XML for development and Firebase for database management.
